snippet.title: Fire Pro Wrestling World - Fighting Road: Champion Road Beyond: Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Fire Pro Wrestling World - Fighting Road: Champion Road Beyond is now digitally available for PS4 and Steam!


Wrestler Morio Sumisu’s life ended in tragedy at the height of his career. Now his son has set out on the same path of glory, but can he find a way to the top without following in his father’s haunted footsteps?
 
Scenario writer SUDA51 returns to the Fire Pro ring for the sequel to his infamous Champion Road scenario that launched his career 26 years ago.



Official Website:
https://spike-chunsoft.com/FPWW/index.htmlPlaystation®4 DLC Page:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/grid/UP4774-CUSA08007_00-FIREPROWRESTLING/1?relationship=add-ons
Steam® Store Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/dlc/564230/Fire_Pro_Wrestling_World/
